import React from 'react' const CharacterItem = ({ item }) => { return (

{item.name}

  • Actor Name: {item.portrayed}
  • Nickname: {item.nickname}
  • Birthday: {item.birthday}
  • Status: {item.status}
) } export default CharacterItem
